titleStmt.title: The sicke-mans comfort against death and the deuill, the law and sinne, the wrath and iudgement of God. Translated out of Frenche into English, by I.E.
Consolation et instruction aux malades contre l'appréhension. English.
titleStmt.author: L'Espine, Jean de, ca. 1506-1597.
Eliot, John.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by J. Eliot, of L'Espine, Jean de. Consolation et instruction aux malades contre l'appréhension.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
